events.message: I am submitting a claim for my car after a recent vehicle collision that occurred last week on the highway.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the details of the car collision submitted by the customer.
An agent has been assigned to handle this auto accident claim to ensure proper processing and timely updates.
We acknowledge receipt of your vehicle accident claim and will begin processing it promptly with priority.
Please provide the police report, photos of the damaged car, and repair estimates to proceed with the investigation.
Customer has submitted all requested documents including the police report and detailed images of the vehicle damage.
Investigation into the car accident claim has started with assessment of damage and inquiry into the collision circumstances.
The investigation was concluded, confirming the collision details and verifying the submitted documents are accurate.
A settlement amount has been proposed based on the damage assessment and policy coverage for your vehicle accident claim.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the prompt response and clarity of the proposed settlement for the car accident.
Your auto accident claim has been approved following acceptance of the settlement proposal and verification of damages.
Payment for the approved claim has been issued to your account to cover the repair costs of your damaged vehicle.
The claim has been officially closed after successful payment and confirmation of repair completion on the car.
Claim documentation and records have been archived for future reference following the closure of the auto accident claim.
